text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

text: The chief value of money lies in the fact that one lives in a world in which it is overestimated.
author: H. L. Mencken

text: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
author: Donald Trump

text: I've seen the ticket, and I still can't believe it. When I see the money, I hope I don't hit the floor.
author: Judy Garland

text: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
